name: The Unity of Babel
description:
A dark take on J.L. Borges' Library of Babel created with the Unity3D engine.

They are a lot of tools on the Internet which can generate books from the Library, but nobody as far as I know tried to simulate the physical experience of wandering to the endless, senseless hallways of the Library. So I have.

You can move with ZQSD and pick up books from the shelves with E.

You may see a video of the game here : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=746jxv90ZH8
